description:
-Over 65,000 Udemy students are currently taking courses by Sebastian, with hundreds of positive (4-5 star) reviews.

-We've been building Udemy courses since 2012, with 38 Udemy courses published and have created educational content for Amazon and Intel.

Become a professional Apple Watch developer by learning how to build your own 5 Real-World wearable apps from scratch using Swift and XCode.

No prior programming experience is required!

By the hand of seasoned iOS developer and consultant Sebastian Dobrincu, you'll build your first 5 Real-World Applications. You can modify these apps and publish them as your own. By enrolling in this course you get full, life-long access to all the material including source code, videos and other assets.

You'll learn how to build 5 different, full apps from scratch:

  • To-Do List App (use Tables, Groups, Targets, Transitions, Passing Data)
  • Stopwatch App (use Timers, Buttons, Design Patterns)
  • Weather App (use Networking, Data Fetching, JSON Format, Custom Menus)
  • Twitter Clone App (use Notifications, Glances, App Icons)
  • Water Intake Calculator App (use Sleek Animations, Data Persistency, Pages)

Not only you will learn how to create useful and interesting apps, but we'll also keep a close eye on design patterns and assure that our creations look as good as possible.

Make your ideas a reality, gain new skills and make money as a freelance Apple Watch developer or by selling your own wearable apps on the App Store!
title: Apple Watch for Beginners, Learn by Making 5 Real-World Apps
